comments.content:
Otama Display comes very close, but I don’t think it’s a perfect match:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tim-donaldson/otama/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415195401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tim-donaldson/otama/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tim-donaldson/otama/")

It’s this older version of Otama e.p.  
 [https://www.behance.net/gallery/1100475/Otama-ep-Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415195401/https:/www.behance.net/gallery/1100475/Otama-ep-Typeface "https://www.behance.net/gallery/1100475/Otama-ep-Typeface")
Thanks, Akira. Nice to know that I wasn’t completely off the mark....
